48.speaker: Withers
48.text: Naught is forgotten. It is recorded.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: I'll leave Alfira here in camp.

56.speaker: Narrator
56.text: Impossible. Thou art bound together, for the moment.

38.speaker: Withers
38.text: Impossible. Thou art bound together, for the moment.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Let Jaheira stay behind for now.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: You can swap out with Minsc.
